code: import React from"react";function NewPatient(props){var patients=props.data.patients;var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();var patient={id:patients.sort(function(a,b){return a.id-b.id;}).slice(-1)[0].id+1,firstname:e.target.firstname.value,surname:e.target.surname.value,birthyear:e.target.birthyear.value,email:e.target.email.value,phone:e.target.phone.value};props.newPatient(patient);e.target.reset();};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,"Sign up new patient"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"firstname",placeholder:"Enter firstname",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"surname",placeholder:"Enter lastname",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"birthyear",placeholder:"Enter birthyear",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"email",placeholder:"Enter e-mail address",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"phone",placeholder:"Enter phonenumber",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"submit",className:"submit",value:"Add patient",required:true}));}export default NewPatient;
